EmailTemplate.name: 2018_NBAA_HappyHour.2018_NBAA_HappyHour
EmailTemplate.subject: Join 2-Time NASCAR Champion Brad Keselowski and Honeywell For Happy Hour at NBAA, October 16
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOU'RE INVITED TO HONEYWELL'S HAPPY HOUR Please join us... Date Tuesday, October 16, 2018
Time 5:00 - 6:30 PM Booth #2600 NBAA Show Floor
You are invited to Honeywell's Happy Hour at NBAA's Business Aviation Convention & Exhibition in Orlando, Florida.
Two-time NASCAR champion Brad Keselowski and chief pilot Joey Meier will explain why their Honeywell-equipped jet gets them safely and on-time to every NASCAR race, and how working with Honeywell is "as easy as ordering a pizza."
Refreshments will be available!
